lines.text: You two ought to get along just like that span of mules over there. They've been wearing the same harness for eleven years.
How are you gonna argue with a female when she's made up her mind?

In the early days when California was first admitted to the Union, a rush of covered wagons, bringing land-hungry settlers, fortune hunters and outlaws, threatened the very existence of the old Spanish Dons and their vast ranchos.
Here they come, these Americanos and their covered wagons. Pedro, the days of the Dons are numbered.
